@GaRoDean @siskey @paolohughes @Motherfocloir @UCDLawSchool @HistoryHub_ie @BordnaGaeilge @UCDIrishStudies 1/2 But original Art. 3 entirely provisional in language. Preamble and Art. 44 (1937version) would have been totally incompatible.
